name: Take care of everyone!
description:
This game is all about how "take  care" can be interpreted in many different ways.

You're supposed to clear the screen of characters by taking care of them all in their own contextually appropriate way! A bad guy!? Take care of him with a sword! A dog!? Take care of him with a walk!

Every character declares the way it  likes to be taken care of each round . There is also a secret way every character likes to be taken care of. Should you not see the direct answer, just ask yourself... how would i take care of this particular character. The secret way does not change! If you find it you can keep using it on that charracter in all your attempts!

This game was a one person effort! created by me: Simon Danckaert.

if you like it ,have some critiques or game ideas  tell me in the comments!

Good luck, have fun!!
